document.full_text: armadillos, with their sharp claws and body armor, don't have a reputation for being cuddly. new research should make them even less so. they turn out to be a potential source of leprosy in genetically-susceptible humans.
document.title: armadillos are source of leprosy in u.s. south
lines_and_colors: armadillos, with their sharp claws and body armor, don't have a reputation for being cuddly. new research should make them even less so. they turn out to be a potential source of leprosy in genetically-susceptible humans.
